name: Waste Walkers Subsistence
storyline: Three years have passed since the world was destroyed by man's inability to cooperate for the greater good. The world has been left in total ruin and humanity is on the verge of extinction. Chaos continues to consume civilization and fear haunts all who still draw breath. Those who do still breathe are confronted with terrible horrors each passing day. Surviving in this new world is not for the faint of heart.
summary: Play in the role of spook, a loner with a dark past, as he attempts to return to his childhood home in search of his family! Use your new abilities, weapons and armor to complete quests and missons on your quest to survive the wastelands!
